channel.title: About the Feature Discover category
channel.description:
Rebol and Red have quite a few cool features - this is PR for them.
In this category topics will focus on some of the more interesting feature in an introductory manner, somewhat like a blog post. In fact, if you've already written about some part of Rebol or Red elsewhere, feel free to write a summary paragraph pointing to your post or a complete transcription (copy and paste) here.
